Premium.title: PureSound Premium Subscription
Premium.description: Experience the unlimited music with PureSound Premium. Choose the plan that suits you best.

benefits.title: Premium Benefits
benefits.description: Enjoy a superior music experience with PureSound Premium. All benefits included in every plan.

weatherPlaylist.title: Weather mood playlists
weatherPlaylist.description: Get personalized playlists based on your local weather.

offline.title: Offline listening
offline.description: Download your favorite tracks and listen offline.

highQuality.title: High-quality audio

exclusiveInterface.title: Exclusive interface themes

earlyAccess.title: Early access to new contents
earlyAccess.description: Be the first to try out demo/release of your favorite artist.

individual.title: Monthly Plan
individual.description: Enjoy the Individual Premium plan with monthly billing. Cancel anytime.

student.title: Monthly Plan
student.description: Enjoy the Student Premium plan with 1 month billing. Cancel anytime.

individual.title: 3 Months Plan
individual.description: Enjoy the Individual Premium plan with 3 months billing. Save 10% with 3 months billing.

student.title: 3 Months Plan
student.description: Enjoy the Student Premium plan with 3 months billing. Save 10% with 3 months billing.

individual.title: 6 Months Plan
individual.description: Enjoy the Individual Premium plan with 6 months billing. Save 15% with 6 months billing.

individual.title: Annually Plan
individual.description: Enjoy the Individual Premium plan with annually billing. Save 20% with annual billing.

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to premium features at the end of your billing cycle.
cancel.success: Your subscription has been cancelled. You will retain access to premium features until the end of your billing cycle.
cancel.failure: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again later.
